epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and security features.
epics.description: Develop a secure login mechanism that includes multi-factor authentication to ensure that only authorized users can access the banking portal. This epic encompasses creating secure user sessions and managing secure storage of user credentials and session keys.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard for users.
epics.description: Develop a user-friendly, customizable dashboard that displays relevant banking products and services based on the user's profile and eligibility. This dashboard should provide users with an overview of their accounts, transactions, and other financial activities.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Develop a responsive design for the portal.
epics.description: Ensure that the portal is responsive and provides a consistent user experience across various devices, including desktop, tablet, and mobile phones. This involves implementing adaptive layouts and testing on different screen sizes and operating systems.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modifications
epics.summary: Enable users to submit account opening requests and service modifications.
epics.description: Implement streamlined workflows that allow users to submit new account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. This includes forms for data entry, validation, and submission, along with workflows for approval and processing of these requests.

epics.title: Real-time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and notifications.
epics.description: Develop features to provide users with real-time status updates on their requests and transactions, along with email notifications. This ensures users are kept informed about the progress of their submissions and any necessary actions they need to take.

epics.title: Interaction History and Documentation Upload
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive interaction history and enable document uploads.
epics.description: Implement functionality to keep a detailed history of user interactions within the portal. Additionally, develop features to allow users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface, ensuring that users can save and resume incomplete applications.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system.
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration of the self-service portal with the bank's existing core banking system. This involves developing secure APIs, data synchronization mechanisms, and maintaining a separate database to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

epics.title: Role-based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and implement role-based access control to ensure that users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level. This includes defining roles, permissions, and access policies tailored to different types of users.

user_stories.title: Secure Login Mechanism
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a secure login mechanism, so that only authorized users can access the banking portal.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Multi-factor authentication, secure session management, storage of user credentials.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The system prompts for multi-factor authentication. 2. Secure sessions are established after successful login. 3. User credentials are stored securely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am an authorized user, When I attempt to login, Then I should be prompted for multi-factor authentication.

user_stories.title: Secure User Session Management
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my session to be managed securely, so that my data and activities are protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Secure session establishment, session timeout, re-authentication.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User sessions are encrypted. 2. Sessions timeout after a period of inactivity. 3. Re-authentication is required after session timeout.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am logged in, When I am inactive for a specified period, Then my session should timeout and I should be required to re-authenticate.

user_stories.title: Secure Storage of User Credentials
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my credentials to be stored securely, so that my information is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Encryption of user credentials, secure storage mechanisms.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User credentials are encrypted before storage. 2. Credentials are stored in a secure manner.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I enter my credentials, When they are saved, Then they should be encrypted and stored securely.

user_stories.title: Customizable User Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a customizable dashboard, so that I can view relevant banking products and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User profile analysis, customizable widgets, eligibility-based display.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays relevant products based on user profile. 2. Users can customize their dashboard. 3. Eligibility for products is assessed and displayed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am logged in, When I customize my dashboard, Then I should see products and services relevant to my profile.

user_stories.title: Account and Transaction Overview
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an overview of my accounts and transactions, so that I can monitor my financial activities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Account summaries, transaction history, data visualization.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can view summaries of their accounts. 2. Transaction history is displayed. 3. Data is visualized effectively.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am logged in, When I access my dashboard, Then I should see an overview of my accounts and recent transactions.

user_stories.title: Personalized Financial Recommendations
user_stories.description: As a user, I want personalized financial recommendations, so that I can make informed decisions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Recommendation engine, user profile analysis, financial insights.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Recommendations are tailored to the user's profile. 2. Relevant financial insights are provided. 3. Users can act on recommendations.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am logged in, When I view my dashboard, Then I should see personalized financial recommendations based on my profile.

user_stories.title: Adaptive Layouts for Multiple Devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want adaptive layouts, so that I can have a consistent experience across devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Layouts adapt to various screen sizes. 2. Consistent user experience across devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I use different devices, When I access the portal, Then the layout should adapt to the screen size and provide a consistent experience.

user_stories.title: Testing for Different Screen Sizes
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to be tested for different screen sizes, so that I can use it effectively on any device.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal is tested on various screen sizes. 2. Any layout issues are resolved.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal is developed, When it is tested on different screen sizes, Then it should work seamlessly across devices.

user_stories.title: Consistent User Experience
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a consistent user experience, so that I can interact with the portal smoothly on any device.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal provides a consistent user experience across devices. 2. UI components behave consistently on different platforms.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I use different devices, When I interact with the portal, Then the user experience should be consistent and intuitive.

user_stories.title: Streamlined Account Opening
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a streamlined account opening process, so that I can quickly and easily open new accounts.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Minimal clicks, user-friendly forms, data validation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can open new accounts with minimal clicks. 2. Forms are user-friendly and require minimal data entry. 3. Data is validated before submission.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I want to open a new account, When I use the portal, Then the process should be quick and straightforward with minimal steps.

user_stories.title: Service Modifications Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an easy process for service modifications, so that I can quickly update my account settings.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Step-by-step workflow, approval and processing, minimal data entry.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The service modification process is straightforward. 2. Users can update account settings with minimal data entry. 3. Updates are subject to approval and processing.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I want to modify my account services, When I use the portal, Then the process should be clear and require minimal data input.

user_stories.title: Data Entry Validation
user_stories.description: As a user, I want data entry validation, so that I can be sure my information is accurate before submission.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Data is validated in real-time. 2. Users receive clear error messages for invalid input.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am entering data, When I input incorrect information, Then I should receive real-time validation error messages to correct it.

user_stories.title: Real-time Request Status
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time updates on my requests, so that I can stay informed about their progress.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users receive real-time updates on their requests. 2. Requests can be tracked through the portal.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have submitted a request, When the status changes, Then I should receive a real-time update.

user_stories.title: Email Notifications for Updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want email notifications for updates, so that I am notified about the progress of my requests.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users receive email notifications for status updates. 2. Email content reflects the current status of the request.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have submitted a request, When the status changes, Then I should receive an email notification.

user_stories.title: Actionable Status Updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want actionable status updates, so that I know if any action is required on my part.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Clear instructions, user engagement, next steps notification.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users are informed of any required actions through status updates. 2. Clear instructions are provided for next steps.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have submitted a request, When a status update requires action, Then I should receive clear instructions on what to do next.

user_stories.title: Comprehensive Interaction History
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a detailed history of my interactions, so that I can review past activities on the portal.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. All user interactions are logged. 2. Users can access and review their interaction history.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am logged in, When I view my history, Then I should see a comprehensive record of my past interactions.

user_stories.title: Document Upload Feature
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload documents, so that I can provide necessary documentation easily.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can upload documents through the portal. 2. Uploaded files are validated.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I need to provide documentation, When I upload a document, Then it should be validated and stored in my records.

user_stories.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save and resume incomplete applications, so that I can finish them at my convenience.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can save incomplete applications. 2. Progress is retained for later completion.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have started an application, When I save my progress, Then I should be able to resume it later without losing any information.

user_stories.title: API Development for Integration
user_stories.description: As a user, I want seamless API integration between the portal and the core banking system, so that my transactions are processed smoothly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Secure APIs are developed. 2. Data is synchronized between the portal and core banking system.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I initiate a transaction, When the integration occurs, Then it should be seamless and secure.

user_stories.title: Data Synchronization Mechanisms
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my data to be synchronized accurately, so that I see current information at all times.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Data is synchronized in real-time. 2. Users always see up-to-date information.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I perform an action, When it requires data synchronization, Then the data should be updated accurately and in real-time.

user_stories.title: Separate Database for Performance
user_stories.description: As a user, I want optimal performance of the portal, so that I can perform my tasks quickly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. A separate database is maintained for the portal. 2. The portal performance is optimized for speed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I use the portal, When I perform various tasks, Then the portal should respond quickly and efficiently.

user_stories.title: Define User Roles
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to define user roles, so that I can manage access effectively.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Different user roles are defined. 2. Access control policies are established.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am an admin, When I define roles, Then each role should have specific permissions.

user_stories.title: Assign Permissions to Roles
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to assign permissions to different roles, so that users have appropriate access.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Permissions are assigned based on roles. 2. Users have access appropriate to their roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have defined roles, When I assign permissions, Then users should have the correct access levels.

user_stories.title: Access Control Policies
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to implement access control policies, so that security is maintained.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Access control policies are implemented. 2. Security is maintained according to policies.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am an admin, When I implement policies, Then the system should enforce security based on these policies.

architecture_generation.description: AWS architecture aligned to equivalent service mappings.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture diagram has been validated and enhanced to ensure all nodes and edges are consistent, unique, and complete. Placeholder nodes were added for missing references, and duplicate IDs were resolved. The architecture now adheres to the Azure Well-Architected Framework with improved security, reliability, and operational excellence. Quality rating: High.
